name: Mythforge (Mythforge)
description:
Mythforge is an RPG inspired by Dark Souls that features a new style of action combat, modular crafting, and some survival elements.

It takes place in a world that was shattered by mysterious magic thousands of years ago. Travel to different islands via a magic gate, explore dungeons, fight undead, mutated, or rusted monsters and gather loot to  craft your legendary weapons.

Currently in development. The current downloadable version is a very short single player dungeon crawler prototype.
